medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started suddenly at 1 am yesterday and has been associated with nausea but no emesis. The pain did not radiate and has not shown significant changes over time. Denies fevers, chills, chest pain, shortness of breath, constipation, diarrhea, or any urinary symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Myelodysplastic syndrome with leukopenia and thrombocytopenia, CAD status post PCI stent, A-fib/flutter, hyperlipidemia, diverticular disease, BPH, spinal stenosis, CHF, incarcerated left inguinal hernia. Past surgical history includes incarcerated left inguinal hernia, appendectomy, parathyroidectomy, and hernia repair.
